post.content:
FYI.

This note has been sent to you by:  Kihup Boo.  IBM Employee Number:
057698

Personal notes from the sender:

The sender provided no additional comments.

Click on the link below to see the latest special offers from the IBM
Employee Purchase Program.

Please click on "Friend & Neighbour" link when you access the website
below.  Then enter Employee Number and passcode:

http://www.thinkpad.com/ibmeppsales/ca  - passcode  -  fndepp
post.title: EPP - Discounted pricing for IBM Canada employees, their family and friends
